name: Cryptic Riddles Quiz
desc: Solve these cryptic riddles and test your wits!
author: AI Enigma (chatgpt)

questions.question: I speak without a mouth and hear without ears. I have no body, but I come alive with the wind. What am I?
I have keys but open no locks. I have space but no room. You can enter but not go outside. What am I?
I'm tall when I'm young and short when I'm old. What am I?
I have keys but can't open locks. I have a lot of memories but can't remember anything. What am I?
The more you take, the more you leave behind. What am I?
I have cities but no houses, forests but no trees, and rivers but no water. What am I?
I am taken from a mine, and shut up in a wooden case, from which I'm never released, and yet I am used by almost every person. What am I?
I'm light as a feather, yet the strongest person can't hold me for much longer than a minute. What am I?
I have keys but open no locks. I have a screen but show no movies. What am I?
I have keys but can't open any door. I have space but no room. What am I?
